filme.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo
filme.descriere: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

filme.stars: Ansel Elgort, Jon Bernthal, Jon Hamm
filme.descriere: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

filme.stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf
filme.descriere: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

filme.stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
filme.descriere: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

filme.stars: Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford
filme.descriere: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

filme.stars: Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck
filme.descriere: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

filme.stars: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth
filme.descriere: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

filme.stars: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
filme.descriere: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

filme.stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz
filme.descriere: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

filme.stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah
filme.descriere: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

filme.stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Michael Madsen
filme.descriere: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

filme.stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
filme.descriere: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

filme.stars: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen
filme.descriere: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

filme.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo
filme.descriere: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

filme.stars: Ben Schwartz, James Marsden, Jim Carrey
filme.descriere: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

filme.stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
filme.descriere: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

filme.descriere: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

filme.stars: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh
filme.descriere: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

filme.stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
filme.descriere: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

filme.stars: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson
filme.descriere: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

filme.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie
